title: There was an error connecting with Maestro.
body: Every time i try to open my Legacy client, that error message occurs ^. However, I do not experience the same problem when i use the Alpha client. I would prefer to use the Legacy client though because the Alpha client runs incredibly slow on my low-end laptop. Any ideas of what could be wrong?

replies.body:
Maestro is the service that tracks where you are in the client and ensures you stay connected. When you have issues connecting to it, it's usually caused by an overall poor connection to our servers. I recommend going through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so as to address the common solutions for this issue.

Let me know if this caused any change.

Hello Mr Rioter, I did try a few of the things on that list you so kindly linked for me, and nothing worked. However, I downloaded your helpful little Hextech Repair Tool, and had it reinstall the game. That did fix the problem, and I am able to use the Legacy client again. Cheers!
